searchByCapabilities.title: Stop wasting time on surface-level CVs
searchByCapabilities.description: See what candidates actually coded, not what they copy-pasted from job ads. GitHub, LinkedIn and portfolio in one place.

discoverExperts.title: Understand how they work — not just what they know

hireFaster.title: Verify skills in 5 minutes, not 5 rounds
hireFaster.description: Every claim links directly to the evidence. Reduce interview rounds and make better decisions faster.

buildInPublic.title: #buildinpublic
buildInPublic.description1: Traditional profiles reduce engineers to numbers — commits, PRs, lines of code. That doesn't paint the {whole} picture.
buildInPublic.description2: recruitos gathers signal from GitHub, LinkedIn and portfolio. We show what the candidate has built, who they've collaborated with, and how they work — with links to the evidence.

dataTransparency.title: data sources & limitations

limitations.title: important limitations
limitations.note: Private repos and enterprise work aren't visible. '0 commits' doesn't mean bad developer — they may work on private/enterprise projects.

score.title: How Alignment Scores Work
score.skillsDesc: Technical skills match with job requirements
score.experienceDesc: Years and depth of relevant experience
score.explanationIntro: The alignment score (0-100) measures how well a candidate matches your job requirements across five key dimensions.
score.skillsExplanation: The most heavily weighted factor. Evaluates technical competencies, programming languages, frameworks, and tools against your requirements.
score.experienceExplanation: Assesses years of relevant experience and depth of expertise in similar roles or projects.
score.industryExplanation: Considers domain knowledge and experience in your specific industry or sector.
score.seniorityExplanation: Matches the candidate's career level with your role requirements (junior, mid, senior, lead).
score.locationExplanation: Evaluates geographic fit, timezone compatibility, and willingness to relocate if applicable.
score.footer: Scores are generated by AI analysis of public profile data and compared against your job context. Higher scores indicate stronger overall alignment.
score.privateReposNote: May work primarily in private repositories

candidate.clickDeepProfile: Click "Deep Profile" for full AI analysis
candidate.viewDeepProfileQuestions: View deep profile for tailored questions
candidate.privateActivityNote: This developer may work primarily on private repositories or enterprise projects. '0 commits' doesn't mean inactive.
candidate.dataSourceBannerGithub: This profile is based on public GitHub activity
candidate.dataSourceBannerBoth: This profile is based on public GitHub activity and LinkedIn data
candidate.dataSourceBannerNote: Only publicly available data is used. Scores reflect observed behavior, not the full picture.

creditsPage.title: Buy Credits for Deep Profile Reports

trust.securePaymentsDesc: Powered by Stripe. Your payment info is encrypted and secure.
trust.instantActivationDesc: Credits are added to your account immediately after purchase.
trust.neverExpireDesc: Your credits remain in your account until you use them.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I do with credits?
faq.a1: Each credit lets you generate one comprehensive deep profile report for a candidate, including AI-powered behavioral insights, skills analysis, and hiring recommendations.
faq.a2: No! Your credits remain in your account indefinitely and can be used whenever you need them.
faq.a3: Unused credits can be refunded within 30 days of purchase. Contact support for assistance.
faq.a4Suffix: for subscription plans with unlimited credits and additional features.

toast.purchaseSuccessDesc: Your credits have been added to your account.
toast.purchaseCancelledDesc: No charges were made to your account.

pricingPage.successBasedDesc: With Full Recruiting, you only pay 5,000 DKK when you successfully make a hire. No upfront fees, no monthly subscriptions.
